data.fullContent: The Netherlands has introduced a new system of health care insurance based on risk equalization through a risk equalization pool. In this way, a compulsory insurance package is available to all citizens at affordable cost without the need for the insured to be assessed for risk by the insurance company. Furthermore, health insurers are now willing to take on high-risk individuals because they receive compensation for the higher risks.
data.answer: 荷兰通过风险均衡池引进了一套基于风险均衡的新医疗保险制度。这样，所有公民都能以负担得起的成本获得强制性一揽子保险，而不需要保险公司对被保险人进行风险评估。此外，健康保险公司现在愿意雇用高风险的个人，因为他们可以得到更高风险的补偿。
